description: A brief explanation of radio broadcasting in Australia. Shows scenes in the Australian Broadcasting Commission's studios and in the Postmaster-General's transmission stations through which typical commercial and non-commercial programs are being broadcast. Use of wireless in ships, aeroplanes, police cars and ambulances, including a symphony concert, a radio play and the children's "Kindergarten of the Air".
